name: Forest Keeper
description:
Forest Keeper is a 3D logic game with many exciting levels!

The Guardian of the Forest has requested you! Darkness has fallen on peaceful lands, and only you can stop it! Solve puzzles with different cubes and go to the end. In the game you will find many unique blocks and levels that can be completed in different ways!

Game Features:
- Lots of levels
- Convenient controls
- Physics
- Colorful graphics
